resources.string: NO PHRASES FOUND FOR THIS WORD IN DATABASE!!!

Turkish-Bosnian-English Dictionary v1.0 

This is trilingual dictionary that contains some useful phrases too. You can search any of these three languages : Bosnian, Turkish or English. 
 
This is project of International Burch University in Sarajevo (Bosnia and Herzegovina) 

For details about project:
marslan@ibu.edu.ba 

Developer email(report bugs here):
sulejmansarajlija@gmail.com
A beautiful, holo-styled dictionary app developed by the Burch University that does translation between Turkish, Bosnian and English languages.
Burch Dictionary project is led by the Burch University. The application uses its own database put together by the students of the Burch University.
People who worked on this app instead of studying for their exams
This guy is the actual developer. He wrote the code from the ground up.
The small-features guy. He implements small, detail features. Oh, he also happens to have designed the new user interface.
Have you seen the online version of this dictionary? Well, this is the guy who is behind that!
Of course, the vocabulary in this app didn\'t just descend from behind the clouds! Someone sacrificed their time and put them together.
This application is open source, yes! It is BSD licensed and contributions are always welcome!
Have a suggestion? Found a bug? Get your voice heard! Please, don\'t send \"Wassup?\" though!
Burch Dictionary implements JakeWharton\'s ActionBarSherlock library which is licensed under Apache 2.0 license
